text: Erin Moran (October 18, 1960 - April 22, 2017) was an American actress She worked mostly in television. She played Joanie Cunningham in the sitcom Happy Days. Moran was born in Burbank, California. Moran died on April 22, 2017 at her mother-in-law's trailer in New Salisbury, Indiana from complications of Squamous cell carcinoma (rare skin cancer) found in the throat at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from squamous-cell carcinoma Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:1960 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Burbank, California
title: Erin Moran
